attributes.title: Dole Pre-Washed Iceberg Lettuce
attributes.description: Created on April 4, 2010 by julioterra on Sourcemap.org.

attributes.name: Dole Iceberg Lettuce Pre-Processed
attributes.title: Dole Iceberg Lettuce Pre-Processed
attributes.description: The Dole lettuce that is processed in the Springfield, OH, plant is grown in California. Soledad is one of the main growing locations for Dole.

attributes.name: Plastic for Lettuce Wrap
attributes.title: Plastic for Lettuce Wrap
attributes.description:
All lettuce is wrapped in plastic for sale at point of retails. These lettuce bag/wrappers are printed with multi-color inks that have their own sources. 

NOTE: I dont know the source of the plastic that is why I set location to Antartica.
